body_content.explanation: a piece of writing on a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine, or on the internet:
examples: There was an interesting article on vegetarianism in the paper yesterday.

body_content.explanation: any of the English words "a", "an", and "the", or words in other languages that do the same job as these
a particular thing, especially one that is one of several things of a similar type or in the same place:
examples: An article of clothing was found near the river.
Guests are advised not to leave any articles of value in their hotel rooms.

body_content.explanation: a separate part in a written document such as a legal agreement:
examples: East and West Germany united under article 23 of the Bonn constitution.

body_content.explanation: work done in a law office while training to be a lawyer:
examples: I'm doing my articles in a small firm in Oxford.
